summary: This is an email chain from May 2021 forwarding an FBI 302 interview report. The emails discuss coordinating an interview with a witness, mentioning the need to speak to her attorney first and noting that another individual (C-20) wants to sit in but is very busy.

persons.name: C-20
persons.role: Individual wanting to sit in on interview
persons.context: Mentioned as someone who wants to sit in on a planned interview but is described as 'totally swamped', making scheduling difficult.

events.title: Interview documented in 302
events.description: An interview was conducted, the report of which is attached as a 302 document (FBI interview report).

keyFacts: An FBI 302 interview report dated 2020-04-10 is being forwarded and discussed.
The email sender plans to help with meeting a witness and wants to speak to her attorney first.
Scheduling an interview is complicated because 'C-20' wants to sit in but is very busy.
The correspondence is external email traffic related to the Epstein investigation from 2021.
